title: cittam irangiyun
sahitya:
cittam irangi un bhaktip-prasAdam aruL tillai naTarAjanE


anupallavi

  mattalai tayir pOlen manam alaiginradE mAya valaigaLai maruvat-tuDikkinradE


caraNam    aim-pulak-kaNaigaLait-taDuttE Ashai Anavattirkkudai koDuttE nambum 
aDiyArai aDuttE ennALum un anbinai maDuttE nenjak-kamalattil un shen 
silambaDi vaittE niruttamiTTun pugazhaip-poruttamAyisaittE anjal enum 
karattai konji siranguvittE attA nAn kANavun ambalak-kUttinai
